hero.title: Takumi Takasuka
hero.description1: Frontend Engineer / Data Engineer / Data Scientist
hero.description2: 4th year student at Nagaoka University of Technology
hero.description3: Affiliated with the Machine Learning Theory Lab
hero.extra_info1: I belong to the information bureau 'NUTMEG', the organizing committee for the university festival, and I am working to DX the festival through web applications.
hero.extra_info2: Leveraging that experience, I have also participated in various hackathons and LT meetings of other organizations.
hero.extra_info3: Additionally, in the Machine Learning Theory Lab, I work with meteorological data and solve tasks related to generating weather forecast comments.
